t.searchParams.set("privy_connector",o?"solana_adapter":"injected"),t.searchParams.set("privy_wallet_client",e),t.searchParams.set("privy_connect_only",String(n)),encodeURIComponent(t.href.replace(/\/$/g,""))}export{m as getWalletConfigForConnector,p as mobileWalletsConfig};
